header.rec_loc: The Free Press Pub in Cambridge.
header.topics: The film ‘Ida’ Communist Polish and German eras; The Cambridge Spies; Sylvia. Joining the Arts Picture House membership.
header.activity: Friends discussing films and joining the Arts Picture House.

speaker.fls: French -- level unspecified; German -- level unspecified
